about_the_game:
Step into the exciting world of gaming and creativity! In this Gaming Café simulation, you’ll take on the role of a café owner, starting from scratch and building your very own gaming hub.

Key Features:

• Design Your Dream Café: Customize your gaming café with a variety of furniture, decorations, and layouts to create the ultimate hangout spot for gamers.

• Host Gaming Sessions: Set up the latest gaming consoles, attract players with popular titles, and watch your café come alive with excitement.

• Café Management: Keep your customers happy by serving delicious snacks and beverages while they enjoy their gaming experience. Manage stock, prices, and customer satisfaction to maximize profits.

• Dynamic Challenges: Face real-world management challenges like power outages, customer complaints, and seasonal trends.

• Expand Your Empire: Start small and grow into the go-to gaming café in the city. Invest in upgrades, new technologies, and better amenities to stay ahead of the competition.

• Community Events: Host tournaments and gaming marathons to attract new customers and build a loyal community of players.

Why This Game Stands Out:

• Realistic Yet Fun: Balances authentic management mechanics with engaging gameplay.

• Immersive Atmosphere: From the buzz of players to the smell of coffee, your café comes alive with detailed visuals and sounds.

• Player-Driven Evolution: Your decisions shape the growth and reputation of your café, offering a unique experience every time you play.

Whether you’re a casual gamer or a simulation enthusiast, this game offers a fresh take on café management with a gaming twist. Can you create the ultimate gaming destination? It’s time to find out!

Wishlist Now!

Don’t miss the chance to build your gaming café empire. Add this game to your wishlist and be the first to play when it launches!

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Warning:

This game contains content intended for mature audiences and may include scenes that some players could find sensitive. The game includes violence, gambling, alcohol consumption, sexual content, and other adult themes. Players may encounter the following content:

	•	Gambling: The game features various gambling options, where players can win or lose money through activities like roulette tables or slot machines.
	•	Alcohol and Entertainment Venues: Players can visit strip clubs, consume alcohol, and optionally request private dances.
	•	Violence and Crime: The game may contain elements of violence and crime, in which the player can participate or witness.
	•	Adult Themes: The game may include sexual content, but it does not feature disturbing themes such as forced sexual acts. These contents are only presented at the player’s discretion.

Please be aware of these elements and note that this content is only suitable for adult audiences.

name: The Capital City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or other shader model 4.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Build and manage your own gaming café! In this Gaming Café simulation, set up the latest consoles to attract players, serve delicious snacks, and grow your café into the most popular gaming hub in the city. Boost customer satisfaction and create your café empire!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Hindi, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
